title: Verify tool works on come home (war) MP3
Fix transcription - vocal file exceeds OpenAI 25MB limit
description: The extracted vocals WAV file is 26.3MB, which exceeds OpenAI Whisper API's 25MB limit. Need to either compress the audio or split it into chunks.

title: Make features optional with config TOML file
description: Add optional config.toml support to enable/disable features (vocal extraction, transcription, range analysis, LLM analysis). Include example config in repo.

title: Merged main branch into copilot/add-musical-key-finder
description: Successfully merged config system, OpenAI API updates, and compression fixes from main into the key finder feature branch

title: Add key detection to config system
